title: Barbapapa en famille !
overview: The adventures of Barbapapa, Barbamama and their seven children: Barbotine the intellectual, Barbabelle the flirt, Barbidur the little tough guy, Barbibul the inventor, Barbidou the animal lover, Barbouille the painter and Barbalala the musician. These funny and very colorful characters have the ability to transform themselves into objects of their choice...
